alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 6:14PM MDT until April 19 at 7:13AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Glasgow MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Dodson affecting Phillips County. .The Milk River near Dodson is estimated to be in minor flooding according to observers. For the Milk River...including Dodson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Dodson. * WHEN...From this evening to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected near the Milk River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM MDT Saturday the stage was estimated at 27.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 PM MDT Saturday was estimated at 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday morning and continue falling to 21.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 615 AM MDT.
